definition: commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)
article/commodity/product/goods/kind/grade/rank/character/disposition/nature/temperament/variety/to taste sth/to sample/to criticize/to comment/to judge/to size up/fret (on a guitar or lute)
classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]
to cross a river/to aid or relieve/to be of help
only used in 濟濟|济济[ji3 ji3]
used in place names associated with the Ji River 濟水|济水[Ji3 Shui3]/surname Ji

sentences.english: The duality of machinery and commodity economy.
sentences.chinese: 机器体系的两重性与商品经济。

sentences.english: The development of commodity economy has given birth to the popular of Christmas and other foreign-festival.
sentences.chinese: 商品经济的发展，催生了圣诞节等洋节的流行。

sentences.english: Market economy is full fledged commodity economy under socialized mass production.
sentences.chinese: 市场经济是社会化大生产条件下充分发育的商品经济。

sentences.english: The development of commodity economy has spawned the popularity of the foreign holidays, such as Christmas etc. …
sentences.chinese: 商品经济的发展，催生了圣诞节等洋节的流行。

sentences.english: Proxy system is a result of highly developed commodity economy.
sentences.chinese: 代理制度是商品经济高度发达的产物。

sentences.english: Wholesale merchandise, with the resulting economic development.
sentences.chinese: 批发是随着商品经济的发展而产生的。

sentences.english: The development of rural commodity of marketing towns are interstimu-lated and interconstrainted.
sentences.chinese: 农村商品经济的发展与集镇建设相互促进，相互制约。

sentences.english: This article elucidates the significance of developing a commodity economy in our country.
sentences.chinese: 这篇文章阐发了在我国发展商品经济的意义。

sentences.english: On the different level that develops in goods economy, have different expressional form.
sentences.chinese: 在商品经济发展的不同阶段上，有不同的表现形式。

sentences.english: His goods economy thought is correct the ankylosis with the mistake.
sentences.chinese: 他的商品经济思想是正确与错误的胶着。

sentences.english: Securities market is the result of highly developed commodity economy.
sentences.chinese: 证券市场是商品经济高度发达的产物。

definition: natural economy (exchange of goods by bartering not involving money)
relations between levels of production/socio-economic relations
